name: DriftWolf
description:
Play in the browser! Fullscreen recommended! Click the bottom right arrows.

I didn't get time to jam until like 4 hours ago. So this is a short game to test one mechanic I've really wanted to try out for Star Fox, DRIFT BOOST.

Fly your ship as close to asteroids as possible without crashing to build up BOOST.

BOOST will decay overtime if you are not close to anything.

Try to get the HIGHEST SPEED or the biggest DISTANCE!

WASD keys to fly the ship

Press P to restart the game

Checkout my twitter for more stuff! @silverhsu
